entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
